Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> what happens when a woodchipper is running, and every exchange out there assume 0.0001 is always fine (which they often do) ?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> might be a way for withdraws to be indefinitely "hung" or maybe even made to expire

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> to research the full implications of Sapling Woodchipper, it's a full time job

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Zcash xtns expire. If the woodchipper runs enough hours to make an xtn expire, it must be re-made.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @Alright that implication has not been fully explored
